name: On a Roll (itch) (sitara)
description:
~

How to launch:

  • In the browser: click run game, and the game will launch a Unity WebGL build on the same page. Click on the button on the bottom-right corner to launch in fullscreen.
  • As a download: download the ZIP file on this page and extract it. Look for the On a Roll.exe file in the extracted folder, and run that.

Controls:

  • Spacebar to interact with puzzle pieces
  • R to restart level
  • Escape to exit to main menu

~

Third-party assets:

  • Creator Kit: Puzzle by Unity Technologies
